mobility.summary: SpotRobot has a quadruped base with multiple revolute joints per leg, enhancing its ability to move over diverse terrains. It is likely capable of navigating stairs or steps to move between floors.

perception.summary: SpotRobot is equipped with two cameras: one on the articulated arm and one at the head, allowing for detailed object perception in various positions on a single floor.

manipulation.summary: SpotRobot has a complex, versatile arm with multiple revolute joints and an end effector. This extends its workspace and precision in rearranging objects in abnormal positions on single and multiple floors.
